subNodes.conversationText: Poor--as always, Mistress. [The dwarf eyes the paladin suspiciously.]
What can I do for you?
Tell me more about your wares.
Tools of a certain trade.  You look like the kind of customer who could benefit from my wares.  Am I wrong?
Spoken like a true liar.  But please, let us do business.
Aye, I'm as right as you are green.  But please, let us do business.
Only to the degree that you think I am willing to give you an honest answer.
Tools of a certain trade. [Looking at Vroman.] You, sir, look like the kind of customer who could benefit from my wares. Am I wrong?
Me?  What makes you think so?
The clever moustache.  But please, let us do business.
I need nothing at the moment.  Farewell.
This does not seem like an ideal place to sell such goods.
It isn't.  Danmar has given me leave to stay here cheap, though, and peddle my wares to guests.  It suits me for now.
Let me see the items you have to sell.
